name: show_id
description: Unique identifier for each show or movie.

name: type
description: Type of title, such as 'Movie' or 'TV Show'.

name: title
description: Title name of the movie or TV show.

name: director
description: Name of the director of the movie or show.

name: cast
description: List of main actors featured in the movie or show.

name: country
description: Country where the movie or show was primarily produced.

name: date_added
description: Date the title was added to Netflix (YYYY-MM-DD as text).

name: release_year
description: Year the movie or show was originally released.

name: rating
description: Age classification or content rating assigned to the title.

name: duration
description: Length of the movie or show in minutes.

name: genres
description: Genres associated with the title, such as Drama or Comedy.

name: language
description: Primary language of the title.

name: description
description: Brief summary or synopsis of the movie or show.

name: popularity
description: Popularity score of the title based on audience activity.

name: vote_count
description: Total number of user votes received.

name: vote_average
description: Average user rating on a 0â€“10 scale.

name: budget
description: Production budget of the movie in US dollars.

name: revenue
description: Total box office revenue generated in US dollars.

name: profit
description: Financial profit calculated as revenue minus budget.

name: roi
description: Return on investment (ROI), calculated as profit divided by budget.
